titles.title: Providing amounts for further expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Ms. Lofgren, Zoe asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct

bill.summary: 2/2/2010--Passed House without amendment. Provides amounts for expenses of the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct for the 111th Congress.
